name: Pioneering Business Solutions
tag_list: email, outlook, hosted-exchange, owa, website, cms, webhosting, hosting-web, web-site, development, web-design, content-management-systems
overview: Pioneering Business Solutions provides businesses with reliable and cost effective business solutions. We specialise in business tools such as hosted Microsoft Exchange, content management systems hosted in the Microsoft cloud and web design services. Cloud hosted Microsoft Exchange Server that guarantees a 99.9% up time, fully synced 25GB mailbox, calendar and contacts in a safe, secure environment. Highly flexible and scalable cloud hosted Content Management Systems for business or personal website hosting and web design services.
